articles.content:
Would you share pictures like this if you knew hackers could see everything on your phone?
Andrew Hoyle/CNET
With flagship phones like the Samsung Galaxy S20 Ultra and iPhone 11 Pro costing over $1… [+7853 chars]

articles.author: Aaron Brown
articles.title: Google Chrome has a useful new trick to keep tabs on your browsing - Express
articles.description: CHROME users can enjoy a nifty new feature designed to make it easier to keep your track of everything in your tabs. First previewed a week ago, unbelievably, the feature is already rolling out to web browser users worldwide right now.
articles.content: Google Chrome isn't hanging around. Last week, the Mountain View-based company previewed a new feature that would enable users to group together tabs to make them easier to identify at a glimpse and … [+1590 chars]
